summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. The invoice details charges, discounts, and payment information, indicating a total amount due of $22.05. It also includes shipment details and contact information for FedEx Revenue Services.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for shipping services provided by FedEx.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-714-27396, dated May 12, 2003.
The total amount due for the shipping services is $22.05.
The invoice includes a discount of $6.60 applied to the total charges.
The shipment was dropped off on May 2, 2003.
The invoice is addressed to Jeffrey Epstein at his New York address.
